00042 class CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet
00043 {
00044 public:
00045         int Order;
00046     AffxString ProbeSetName;
00047     unsigned char Chromosome;
00048     unsigned int Position;
00049     float Signal;
00050     float MedianSignal;
00051     float XXMedianSignal;
00052     float YMedianSignal;
00053     double Log2Ratio;
00054     std::vector<double> Waves;
00055     std::vector<float> AllCovariates;
00056     unsigned char ProcessFlag;
00057 
00058     float getCovariateValue(int i);
00059     unsigned char getProcessFlag();
00060     unsigned char getChromosome();
00061     double getLog2Ratio();
00062     void setLog2Ratio(double f);
00063 
00064     CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet()
00065     {
00066                 Order = 0;
00067         Chromosome = 0;
00068         Position = 0;
00069         Signal = 0;
00070         MedianSignal = 0;
00071         XXMedianSignal = 0;
00072         YMedianSignal = 0;
00073         Log2Ratio = 0;
00074         ProcessFlag = (unsigned char)0;
00075     }
00076 
00077     int compareTo(CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet& that, int iCompareCode)
00078     {
00079         int iCompareResult = 0;
00080         switch (iCompareCode)
00081         {
00082         case 0:
00083             iCompareResult = strcmp(ProbeSetName.c_str(), that.ProbeSetName.c_str());
00084             break;
00085         case 1:
00086             iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned char>::compare(Chromosome, that.Chromosome);
00087             if (iCompareResult == 0) {iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(Position, that.Position);}
00088             if (iCompareResult == 0) {iCompareResult = strcmp(ProbeSetName.c_str(), that.ProbeSetName.c_str());}
00089             break;
00090         }
00091         return iCompareResult;
00092     }
00093 
00094     template<int k> struct ComparePred {
00095         bool operator()(const CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* lhs, const CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* rhs) const {
00096             Err::errAbort("CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet: ComparePred instantiated with an invalid compare code = " + ToStr(k));
00097             return false;
00098         }
00099     };
00100 };
00101 
00102 template<> struct CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet::ComparePred<0> {
00103     bool operator()(const CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* lhs, const CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* rhs) const {
00104         return strcmp(lhs->ProbeSetName.c_str(), rhs->ProbeSetName.c_str()) < 0;
00105     }
00106 };
00107 template<> struct CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet::ComparePred<1> {
00108     bool operator()(const CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* lhs, const CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* rhs) const {
00109         int iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned char>::compare(lhs->Chromosome, rhs->Chromosome);
00110         if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00111             iCompareResult = AffxArray<unsigned int>::compare(lhs->Position, rhs->Position);
00112         }
00113         if (iCompareResult == 0) {
00114             iCompareResult = strcmp(lhs->ProbeSetName.c_str(), rhs->ProbeSetName.c_str());
00115         }
00116         return iCompareResult < 0;
00117     }
00118 };
